{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_BruisAttack}} {{doomwiki|A_BruisAttack}} '''A_BruisAttack'''
(no parameters)
The attack of Doom's [[Classes:HellKnight|Hell Knight]] and [[Classes:BaronOfHell|Baron of Hell]]. This either shoots a [[Classes:BaronBall|BaronBall]] or if the target is sufficiently close plays the sound ''"baron/melee"'' and performs a melee attack with a base damage of 10 multiplied by a random value between 1 and 8.
The behavior of this function can be replicated by the use of [[A_CustomComboAttack]] in the following manner:
A_CustomComboAttack("BaronBall", 32, 10 * random(1, 8), "baron/melee")
== Examples == This example is taken straight from Doom's Hellknight.
Melee: Missile: BOS2 EF 8 [[A_FaceTarget]] BOS2 G 8 [[A_BruisAttack]] // See [[Classes:BaronBall|BaronBall]] goto See
